name: page_1

next_pages.name: page_2
next_pages.description: You decide to scream for a little while.

next_pages.name: page_3
next_pages.description: Alright, time to get moving! You start walking forwards

text: You awake to find yourself in the middle of a forest. It's pretty dark and that is kind of scary. What's more scary is the fact that you don't remember anything. Oooooh. Whatcha gonna do?

name: page_2
text: Your frantic screams wake up the bats. You're done for.

name: page_3
text: You walk forward, and as it turns out your home was about 5 minutes away. You're safe now, until the NEXT TIME!
